page_content: The page provides information on how to filter and use the open data catalog of the Canton of Zurich.
The page offers various training and technical materials for civil protection.
The page provides information on a J+S Allround (Children) training course for individuals involved in after-school care.
The page provides a guide on how to use the eQuest web portal for withholding tax accounting.
The page provides information on how to file tax returns electronically and offers downloadable software for offline tax filing.
The page provides guidelines for filing tax returns using electronic tools, including software requirements and formats.
The page discusses energy efficiency measures for large consumers and provides guidelines and Excel templates for energy analysis.
